thread.section_title: Naked Wines Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Naked Wines | nakedwines.com.au
thread.title: Tom McGrath
thread.title_full: Naked Wines reviewed by Tom McGrath

author: Tom McGrath
title: Tom McGrath
text: we started with the voucher as well and we were a little skeptical of the whole process...I did write them an email asking about getting my money in my account back if I wanted it and they promptly replied that yes I could...I decided to leave it going as we enjoyed the first mixed case of red wines we bought...since then we have had a second case sent and we will soon be ordering our third..i would recommend naked wines with the caveat that we are not super snobby wine critics, we just enjoy a decent glass or two of red wine and they have not disappointed us yet.
